N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 307.2 - Eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Any academic
year or college year employee whose professional obligation is changed to that
rendered by a calendar year employee may receive a salary adjustment increasing
his base salary by not more than 20 percent of such salary, not to exceed the
maximum salary authorized for the position. Such salary adjustment shall be
computed after any other annual increase provided pursuant to law. (b) Any calendar year employee whose
professional obligation is changed to that rendered by an academic year or
college year employee shall receive a salary adjustment reducing his base
salary by not more than 16.67 percent; provided, however, that in no case shall
the adjusted salary exceed the maximum salary authorized for the position. Such
salary adjustment shall be computed after any annual increase provided pursuant
to law. (c) The provisions of this
section shall apply to those cases where a college year obligation of less than
10 months is involved; however, the percentage limitations shall be
proportionally adjusted by an amount appropriate to the shorter
obligation. Notes
